textBox.richText: Floyd Landis had the benefit of performance enhancing steroids to do his little ride. We had to settle for performance enhancing ice cream. Yum yum!! Today we did what about a gazillion other tourists decided to do and hire bikes to ride the Golden Gate. San Francisco put on another stellar day (I’m sounding like a broken record here) which really made the trip a blast. After conquering the Fisherman’s Wharf and the Golden Gate, we rode to a cute little town on the other side of the bridge called Sausalito. The town is famous for its German sausage (hence its name). Actually I made that up. Would be cool if it were true. I have no idea what it is famous for apart from the fact that you can catch a ferry back to SF to save yourself busting a nut riding back over the bridge. We hung out and did a few other touristy things whilst in the Fisherman’s Wharf area such as Lombard St. We’ve added a few more photos to the gallery here.
